other: The script uses the bsub command to submit a job to a batch system.
The script sets the SCRAM_ARCH environment variable to slc6_amd64_gcc491.
The script runs an executable named "__EXECUTABLE__" with arguments 18.4, 0, and "__RUNNUMBER__".
The output of the executable is written to a file named "Result.txt".
The script then compresses the "Result.txt" file using bzip2 and renames the compressed file to "__RESULT__".
The script uses placeholders like "__EXECUTABLE__", "__RUNNUMBER__", and "__RESULT__", which likely indicate that these values are provided by an external system or configuration.
